function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for airborne transmission of infectious diseases in enclosed spaces","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within buildings and urban areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of ventilation systems, air purifiers, and regular cleaning and disinfection of common touch surfaces","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and disinfection technologies","People":"Individuals in buildings and urban areas","Owner":"Building managers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Temporary measures during pandemics leading to long-term changes","Impact":"Potential for temporary measures like social distancing and quarantine to become permanent, impacting social interactions and public spaces","Mitigation":"Careful evaluation of the long-term impact of temporary measures before making them permanent","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers, public health experts"}]}
